Objectifs du module: This course is an introduction to Data Analytics Methods and Technics. It starts with a scratch introduction to data analysis. It also covers data visualization and unsupervised learning models (PCA and Clustering). Applications and examples are developed using R and Dataviz software. Evaluation: Oral presentation Address : PSE- Campus Jourdan
D\u00e9partement de rattachement: Master of Science Sustainable Impact Analysis
